headline: A Look At Northern Trust (NTRS) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Record Capital Returns
summary: Northern Trust (NTRS) shares are in focus after the bank reported quarterly earnings and revenue above analyst expectations, supported by trust fee growth, higher net interest income, and AI driven efficiency gains. See our latest analysis for Northern Trust. Northern Trust’s latest results come on top of a steady share price return, with the stock gaining 17.52% over 90 days and a 1-year total shareholder return of 37.93%, suggesting momentum has been building as earnings, capital returns,...
